title: Chill Pill
text: Chill Pill is the fourth album by American metal band <a href="Warrior%20Soul">Warrior Soul</a>, released in 1993. It was remastered and re-released with bonus tracks on CD and <a href="MP3">MP3</a> in 2009 by Escapi Music. <a href="Michael%20Monroe">Michael Monroe</a> of <a href="Hanoi%20Rocks">Hanoi Rocks</a> fame plays harmonica on the track "High Road".
